text: The Honda S2000 was a rear wheel drive roadster created by the car company Honda. The concept version of the S2000 was know as SSM and it was first shown in the Toyoko Motor Show in 2005. It was first on sale in April 1999. It was the successor (new model) of the S800. Production of the Honda S2000 ended in 2009. == Models == AP1 The S2000 was introduced in 1999 as a 2000 model. AP2 In 2004, the new S2000 was introduced. == References == * Category:Honda automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Honda S2000
